articles.title: 8-year-old rushed to hospital due to mystery illness linked to COVID-19 - ABC News
articles.content:
Jayden Hardowar, 8, of Richmond Hill, Queens, spiked a mild fever sometime around April 23.
A pediatrician told Jayden's parents not to worry and to continue taking children's Tylenol, his father, Roup Hardowar, told ABC News on Thursday.

articles.description: Men and women aged 40-79 are at significantly lower (25-27%) risk of long or frequent hospital admissions if they do some form of physical activity, a new study suggests.
